Directions: In a bowl, combine hash browns, oil and pepper. Press onto the bottom and 1 in up the sides of an ungreased 9-in. square baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 15 minutes. Meanwhile, in a skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink; drain. Stir in gravy mix and water. Add vegetables and garlic powder. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in 1/2 cup cheese and half of the onions. Spoon into the potato shell. Bake, uncovered, at 350 degrees F for 15 minutes. Sprinkle with the remaining cheese and onions. Bake 5 minutes longer.
Ingredients: 4 cups frozen shredded hash brown potatoes, thawed
1 (.75 ounce) packet dry brown gravy mix
1 (10 ounce) package frozen mixed vegetables, thawed
